item.title: 住宅建筑商押注 1%房贷利率将唤醒美国购房者
item.description: 由于平均抵押贷款利率接近 6%，美国购房者的月供是一年中最实惠的。但圣安东尼奥房地产经纪人塔文-韦曼（Tavyn Weyman）知道如何让月供降低— 低得多。【原文：With the average mortgage rate near 6%, US homebuyers are looking at the most affordable monthly payments in a year. But San Antonio real estate agent Tavyn Weyman knows how to get them lower — much lower.】

item.title: 中产阶级缩减开支，"简易塔 "式的美国经济岌岌可危
item.description: 今年美国经济出人意料的韧性掩盖了中低收入家庭的潜在疲软，因为高收入美国人继续推动经济增长。【原文：The surprising resilience of the US economy this year is masking underlying weakness among low- and middle-income households, as higher-income Americans continue to drive growth.】

item.title: 巴菲特和巴克莱市场指标向股票牛市发出警告
item.description: 美国股市自四月低点以来飙升了 36%，令人眼花缭乱。现在，它正面临着投资传奇人物沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）所看好的一个机会。【原文：The US stock market has roared past every caution sign on its way to a dizzying 36% surge since the April lows. It’s now staring down one favored by investing legend Warren Buffett.】

item.title: 据说贝恩将为基础设施公司 Eleda 的首次公开募股挑选银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，贝恩资本已为瑞典基础设施项目和服务提供商 Eleda 的首次公开募股挑选了银行。【原文：Bain Capital has picked banks for an initial public offering of Eleda, a Swedish infrastructure projects and services provider, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 经历多年痛苦后，南欧寻求提升中产阶级水平
item.description: 二十年前，当 Umberto Dulizia 决定成为一名护士时，他从未想过自己会为生计而挣扎。【原文：When Umberto Dulizia decided to be a nurse twenty years ago, he never thought he’d struggle to make ends meet.】

item.title: 尽管面临美国关税阻力，申银万国仍希望在 2025 年实现 20 亿美元利润
item.description: 申银万国（Shein Group Ltd.）向投资者表示，该公司预计 2025 年的净收入将达到 20 亿美元的丰收水平，因为通过提价和削减成本提高了利润率，有助于克服唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的惩罚性关税造成的在线流量下降。【原文：Shein Group Ltd. has told investors that it’s expecting a bumper $2 billion in net income in 2025, after higher profit margins through price hikes and cost-cutting helped overcome a drop in online traffic caused by President Donald Trump’s punitive tariffs.】

item.title: 美国就业数据疲软引发降息押注，国债反弹
item.description: 在数据显示美国就业市场步履蹒跚之后，国债走高，交易员们加大了对美联储降息的押注。【原文：Treasuries advanced and traders boosted wagers on Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts after data pointed to a stumbling US jobs market.】

item.title: 灰熊发布利空报告后，HelloFresh股价暴跌
item.description: 做空机构 Grizzly Research LLC 发布报告称，这家德国订餐公司的管理层 "似乎正在以牺牲股东利益为代价，优先考虑自我致富"，随后 HelloFresh SE 股价周四下跌达 15%。【原文：HelloFresh SE shares dropped as much as 15% on Thursday after short seller Grizzly Research LLC published a report that claimed the German subscription meals company’s management is “seemingly prioritizing self-enrichment at shareholders’ expense.”】

item.title: 电动车制造商踏板车销量减少，Ola Electric 股价下跌
item.description: Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. 的股价创下两个月来的最大跌幅，此前这家印度电动摩托车制造商下调了全年销售和营收目标，并警告称本财年剩余时间的需求将更加疲软。【原文：Ola Electric Mobility Ltd.’s shares were headed for the biggest drop in two months, after the Indian electric-scooter maker slashed its full year sales and revenue targets, warning of weaker demand in the remainder of the fiscal year.】

item.title: 英国建筑业遭遇五年多来最严重下滑
item.description: 英国建筑业的萎缩速度达到了疫情高峰以来的最快速度，这与工党政府推动房屋建设和刺激更多英国基础设施投资的雄心壮志背道而驰。【原文：British construction activity has shrunk at its fastest pace since the height of the pandemic, defying the Labour government’s ambitions of boosting housebuilding and stimulating more investment in UK infrastructure.】

item.title: 尽管支出飙升，慧科仍继续进军美国市场
item.description: Wise Plc 正在继续推进其成为国家信托银行和在美国双重上市的计划，尽管这些努力削弱了该公司的利润，而且该公司还面临着传统贷款机构的反击。【原文：Wise Plc is forging ahead with its plan to become a national trust bank and dually list its shares in the US even as the efforts crimp profits and the company faces push back from traditional lenders.】

item.title: 乌克兰声称俄罗斯卢克石油炼油厂遭到无人机袭击
item.description: 乌克兰说，它成功地用无人机袭击了卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC）在俄罗斯的伏尔加格勒（Volgograd）炼油厂，增加了该国石油工业的压力。【原文：Ukraine said it made a successful drone strike at Lukoil PJSC’s Volgograd refinery in Russia, adding to the pressure on the country’s oil industry.】

item.title: 挪威银行维持利率不变，下一次降息仍遥遥无期
item.description: 挪威央行继续维持借贷成本不变，并重申官员们将在对经济进行一段时间评估后，才会进一步削减借贷成本。【原文：Norway’s central bank kept borrowing costs on hold and reiterated that officials will take a while to assess the economy before delivering any further cuts.】

item.title: 因人工智能和成本削减，美国 10 月裁员人数创 20 多年来之最
item.description: 根据职业介绍公司Challenger, Gray & Christmas Inc.的数据，随着人工智能重塑各行各业，成本削减加速，美国公司在10月份宣布的裁员数量创下20多年来的最高纪录。【原文：US companies announced the most job cuts for any October in more than two decades as artificial intelligence reshapes industries and cost-cutting accelerates, according to data from outplacement firm Challenger, Gray & Christmas Inc.】

item.title: 泰国国王将对中国进行 "历史性 "访问，标志着 50 年的友好关系
item.description: 在两国建交 50 周年之际，泰国国王玛哈-哇集拉隆功（Maha Vajiralongkorn）将应习近平主席的邀请对中国进行首次国事访问。【原文：Thailand’s King Maha Vajiralongkorn is set to make the first state visit by a Thai monarch to China at the invitation of President Xi Jinping, as the two nations mark 50 years of diplomatic relations.】

item.title: 土耳其将就 F-16 成本问题与洛克希德公司举行新会谈
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，土耳其将与国防巨头洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin Corp.）举行新一轮会议，以解决数十亿美元新F-16战斗机订单的价格争议。【原文：Turkey will hold another round of meetings with defense giant Lockheed Martin Corp. to resolve a price dispute over new multibillion-dollar F-16 fighter jet orders, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度大米丰收给亚洲大米价格带来更大压力
item.description: 随着印度大米丰收，全球供应充足，同时世界最大的进口国减少海外采购以支持当地农民，亚洲大米价格有望进一步下跌。【原文：Rice prices in Asia are poised to fall further as a bumper Indian harvest adds to plentiful global supply, while the world’s biggest importer curbs its overseas purchases to support local farmers.】

item.title: 今年福林和兹罗提飙升，押注东欧初见成效
item.description: 由于交易商押注利率将在更长时间内持续走高，东欧货币在新兴市场国家中涨幅最大。【原文：Currencies in eastern Europe are notching some of the biggest gains in the emerging market world as traders bet on interest rates staying higher for longer.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚限制新的镍矿开采许可以增加生产价值
item.description: 印度尼西亚已停止批准生产某些中间产品的镍工厂的申请，这是世界上最大的金属生产国再次推动向价值链的高端发展。【原文：Indonesia has stopped approving applications for nickel plants that make certain intermediate products, a renewed push by the world’s biggest producer of the metal to move further up the value chain.】

item.title: 沙特小型公司将在估值审查中测试首次公开募股市场
item.description: 一些规模较小的公司正勇敢地在沙特阿拉伯低迷的股票市场上出售股票，但它们的成功将取决于定价纪律，因为投资者的选择性越来越强。【原文：A clutch of smaller companies is braving Saudi Arabia’s subdued equity market with share sales, but their success will hinge on pricing discipline as investors grow more selective.】

item.title: 银行家认为 Reliance 的 Jio 价值高达 1700 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）旗下无线运营商进行破纪录的首次公开募股之前，投资银行家们正在为 Jio Platforms Ltd. 提出高达 1,700 亿美元的估值。【原文：Investment bankers are proposing a valuation of as much as $170 billion for Jio Platforms Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter, ahead of what could be a record-breaking initial public offering for Reliance Industries Ltd.’s wireless carrier.】

item.title: 法国呼吁欧盟调查 Shein 并对零售商采取行动
item.description: 在法国政府因被投诉销售儿童性玩偶和武器而暂停该平台后，法国已要求欧盟委员会调查申银万国集团，并对这家中国电子商务巨头采取进一步措施。【原文：France has asked the European Commission to investigate Shein Group and take added steps against the Chinese e-commerce giant, after the French government moved to suspend the platform over complaints about sales of childlike sex dolls and weapons.】

item.title: SBI 批准通过 IPO 出售 SBI 基金管理公司股权
item.description: 印度国家银行董事会已批准通过首次公开募股剥离其共同基金部门 6.3% 股份的计划，这标志着向释放印度最大资产管理公司之一的价值迈出了关键一步。【原文：State Bank of India’s board has cleared a plan to divest a 6.3% stake in its mutual fund arm through an initial public offering, marking a key step toward unlocking value in one of India’s largest asset managers.】

item.title: 华为首推超薄 iPhone Air 回应售价 590 美元
item.description: 华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.【原文：Huawei Technologies Co. added a thin new handset to its lineup, marking the Chinese tech champion’s most direct response to Apple Inc.’s iPhone Air.】

item.title: 苏黎世首次尝试失败后重启 200 亿美元人寿资产出售计划
item.description: 苏黎世保险集团（Zurich Insurance Group AG）在去年向 Viridium Holding 出售德国寿险保单组合的计划失败后，再次就出售该组合进行谈判。【原文：Zurich Insurance Group AG is again in talks to sell a portfolio of German life insurance policies after a plan to offload the legacy book to Viridium Holding last year fell through.】

item.title: 首次公开募股飙升，SMBC 2 亿美元基金押注印度初创企业
item.description: 由三井住友金融集团（Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc.【原文：A fund co-run by the banking arm of Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc. plans to pour the bulk of the $200 million it has raised into Indian startups, betting that the country’s booming IPO market will create opportunities to cash out.】

item.title: 德国工业仅出现部分反弹，汽车产量有所增长
item.description: 德国 9 月份工业生产增幅低于预期，凸显出这个欧洲最大经济体正在缓慢摆脱多年来的低迷。【原文：German industrial production rose less than expected in September, underscoring how Europe’s largest economy is only slowly emerging from a multi-year slump.】

item.title: 印度信实公司试图以罕见报价出售中东石油
item.description: 信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）正在寻求向国内和国际买家出售一些中东石油货物，这对通常是主要买家的印度炼油商来说是一个不同寻常的举动。【原文：Reliance Industries Ltd. is seeking to sell some cargoes of Middle Eastern oil to domestic and international buyers, in an unusual move for the Indian refiner that’s normally a major buyer.】

item.title: 中国出口激增，马士基提升全球航运业展望
item.description: 在中国出口激增的推动下，A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S 提高了全年利润指导和全球集装箱市场扩张预测。【原文：A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S improved its full-year profit guidance and the forecast for global container market expansion, driven by a surge in Chinese exports.】
